obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_42_0: See if you can&dodge this, Kris!
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_47_0: Kris^1! I get it^1!&Your head's gotten big&from solving that puzzle&by DUMB LUCK!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_79_0: So now you think&it's your chance to&usurp me at my weakest.../%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_88_0: By taking my most&precious thing..^1. Noelle!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_98_0: But guess what, Kris!&I have one or more things&you will NEVER have!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_146_: That's right, Kris!&Unlike YOU, I have a&LOVING TEAM behind me!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_161_: And you'll never beat&US fighting alone!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_182_: ... h-hey^1, wait^1, where'd&the other guys go!?/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_199_: Kris..^1. you're outmatched^1!&My team is rich in&natural resources!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_202_: My..^1. my allies are gone^1?&Ha^1! They're probably just..^1.&Helping Queen search for me!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_218_: Sh..^1. shut up^1, Kris^1! Shut up^1!&I don't care if you're not&saying anything!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_241_: S-summon more guys!^1?&I..^1. I don't need to do that!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_171_: Noelle, this might hurt,&but it's to save you!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_266_: Just WAIT^1! The original&ones are gonna come&back any minute now!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_236_: Now's your chance to&come back over here!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_125_: * Berdly tries to entice Noelle to his side by gyrating his hips!
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_127_: * Berdly laughs and goes to his mind palace.
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_338_: * Berdly crushes his Smart Scouter out of frustration.
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_147_: * BERDLY - He usually only gets this mad when you play games together./%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_371_: * Enemy Weakness: ICE&Try your strongest ice spell./%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_162_: * You acted like you were an idiot next to Berdly's genius!/
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_164_: * Ahh^1, Kris..^1. A shame I must defeat someone so lowly.../%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_175_: * You did several math problems incorrectly!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_181_: * You pretended to knit a home-made dunce cap!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_187_: * You grunted like a primitive animal!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_194_: * You pretended to spill your IQ points on the floor!/
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_195_: * You got Noelle to pretend to pick them up!/
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_215_: \E3* Wh..^1. what!? Trying to psyche me out^1, Kris!?/
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_245_: * You encouraged Noelle to use her mind!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_252_: * Her MAGIC increased^1! Berdly found her smarts appealing!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_299_: * Noelle tried to talk to Berdly!/
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_301_: \EI* Umm^1, Berdly^1, I'm glad you're trying to help me.../
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_303_: \EJ* No need to thank me^1, dearest Noelle!/%
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_359_: \Ee* I..^1. I don't know that spell./
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_366_: \EW* I don't know what you're talking about./
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_373_: \EZ* I... I don't know what you're talking about!/
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_379_: \EV* Fine^1. You want to see what happens so bad?/
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_380_: \Ef* Watch what happens when I cast a spell I don't know!/
obj_berdlyb2_enemy_slash_Step_0_gml_443_: * There was so much snow^1, I couldn't see anything.../
